alert.note: Alert for Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:28PM EDT until June 22 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PALM BEACH COUNTY... At 428 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Palm Beach Gardens to near Wellington, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Boynton Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens and Lake Worth. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
